generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Block Description
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Information about the block, must have at minimum an "identifier" and can have also the following optional field "menu_category", "states" and/or "traits"

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: Must have a namespace and can't use the "minecraft" one. Example: "namespace:my_block"

fields.title: Menu Category
fields.description: Configures the block behavior in inventory and menu category

fields.title: States
fields.description: Define custom states for a block that can be referenced in permutation. Each state must contain an array or a "values" with an array or a "min"/"max" range

fields.title: Traits
fields.description: Change the placement position and direction behavior of a block
